alert.note: Alert for Clare; Lake; Mason; Osceola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 15 at 3:34PM EDT until May 15 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * Winds...West around 10 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 16 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 70s. * Impacts...burn restrictions are likely in effect. for more information on burn restrictions...visit the michigan dnr website at www.michigan.gov/burnpermit or call 866-922-2876. * Impacts...burn restrictions are likely in effect. for more information on burn restrictions...visit the michigan dnr website at www.michigan.gov/burnpermit or call 866-922-2876.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. The combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Be careful with any activities that could potentially lead to a wildfire. Camping...outdoor grills...smoking materials...chain saws...and all terrain vehicles all have the potential to throw a spark and ignite a dangerous and destructive fire.
